verbs.description: [ARG0: iheartmedia media] [V: seeks] [ARG1: bankruptcy protection] iheartmedia the nation largest owner of radio stations has filed for chapter 11 bankruptcy according to reuters the san antonio - based company said it reached an agreement with creditors to shed 10 billion of its more than 20 billion in debt iheartmedia iheartradio iheartmedia media bankruptcy protection san antonio based bankruptcy bob pittman the river thomas h lee
